task_summary: Place the green glass bottle onto the table surface and release it safely.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style manipulator interacts with tabletop items: a green glass bottle, red bottle, blue can, orange cups, a clear cup, and a small can. The goal is to put down the green glass bottle onto the table in a stable upright pose. The robot approaches a table placement area, performs a gentle press to ensure contact, opens the gripper to release, and retreats to avoid collisions. Motions should be deliberate, low force, and time-bounded.
preconditions: Robot is already holding the green glass bottle
Table surface is clear at the intended spot
stepwise_plan: Verify the bottle is in the gripper
Move above a safe placement point on the table
Lower and gently press the bottle onto the surface
success_criteria: Bottle rests stably on the table
failure_and_recovery: If contact not detected or placement unstable, retry moving above the spot and re-place with lower force
If release fails, reopen gripper and wiggle minimally
If occlusions occur, adjust approach height and reattempt
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the robot has released the bottle and retreated, with the bottle upright on the table.

frame_3.now_evidence: Gripper aligned over the placement area with bottle close to surface.
frame_3.predicts_next: Lowering and release should follow immediately.

node_specs.description: Ensure the robot is currently holding the bottle.
Move above the designated table placement point.
Lower and gently press the bottle onto the table.
Back off to a safe distance after placement.

failure_modes: Table spot not flat leading to tilt
recovery_strategy: Re-approach with slightly higher offset and re-place
Re-open gripper and nudge minimally, then retry
Choose a nearby free spot and repeat sequence
Reduce press force and try again
assumptions: Green bottle in frames is the 'glass bottle' referenced by the instruction
Robot already grasps the bottle at episode start; no additional pick is required

expected_success_criteria: End-effector clear of objects by >5 cm
